meanings.definition: A survey conducted before an event or project to gather information or data.
meanings.sent1: Before starting the project, they conducted presurveys to collect data.
meanings.sent2: The presurveys helped them understand the needs of the community before the event.
meanings.sent3: The presurveys revealed some unexpected facts about the participants.
meanings.sent4: The presurveys acted as a compass, guiding them in the right direction.
meanings.sent5: The presurveys painted a clear picture of the situation ahead.

meanings.definition: To conduct a survey before an event or project.
meanings.sent1: They presurveys the area to gather opinions before making any decisions.
meanings.sent2: She presurveys regularly to ensure she is well-prepared for her projects.
meanings.sent3: He presurveys with enthusiasm, making it an enjoyable task.
meanings.sent4: Presurveys the landscape before embarking on your journey.
meanings.sent5: Presurveys diligently to avoid any surprises later on.
